Become Lightning and rush forward. • Passing through Enemies deals {Damage}()Damage. • Become briefly Unselectable.
If the Blade is in the world: • Dash into the Blade to recall it. • Deals {Damage}()Damage to nearby Enemies. • Knocks Up and Stuns for {StunDuration}s.
abilities.menuDescription: Kwang dashes forward, becoming Unselectable and dealing 60/80/100/120/140 (+40%) to all Enemy Units he passes through. When the Blade is in the world, if Kwang dashes within 300 units of its radius he will summon it back to his hand with a crash of lightning, dealing the damage to all nearby Enemy Units and Knocking them Up for 0.5s.
abilities.simplifiedDescription:
Dash forward dealing damage to all enemies passed through.
If the blade is in your path, knock up and deal extra damage to enemies.

abilities.name: FuryoftheHeavens
abilities.gameDescription:
Channel a strike with the Heavenly Blade. • Deals {Damage}()Damage to nearby Enemies. • Slows by {SlowMagnitude}% for {SlowDuration}s.
If the Blade is in the world: • Kwang will Teleport to the Blade before striking.
abilities.menuDescription: Channel a strike with the Heavenly Blade, dealing 230/340/450 (+85%) magical damage and appying a 45/55/65% Slow for 2s to nearby Enemy Units. If the Blade is in the world, Kwang will Teleport to it before striking.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Teleport to the Heavenly Blade creating a massive electrical explosion dealing massive damage to all enemies.

abilities.name: StrikeoftheHeavens
abilities.gameDescription:
On damaging an Enemy with an Ability: • Gain a stack of Energized for {Duration}s, up to a max of 3.
Energized Empowers Basic Attacks: • Gain {AttackSpeed}% Attack Speed. • Strike the Target with a Bolt. • Bolts deal {Damage}()Damage to nearby Enemies. • Hitting a Hero reduces Ability Cooldowns by {CDR}s.
abilities.menuDescription: When Kwang damages an Enemy with an ability his Heavenly Blade becomes Energized with electricity for 4s, stacking up to 3 times. Whilst Energized, Kwang gains 45% attack speed and his next basic attack strikes lightning from above dealing 10/12/14/16/18/22/26/30/34/38/44/50/56/62/68/73/78/83 (+4 per level)(+15%) magical damage to the Target and nearby Enemies. If this damages an Enemy Hero, Kwang reduces his basic ability cooldowns by 0.6s per stack.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Dealing ability damage will energise the Heavenly Blade. Whilst Energised, you gain attack speed and your basic attacks deal extra damage in an AoE around the target.

perks.name: Perk_Kwang_AscensionOfTheHeavens
perks.description: Fury of the Heavens' Cooldown is reduced by 20s and Kwang no longer retrieves his Heavenly Blade upon Recalling.

perks.name: Perk_Kwang_SalvationOfTheHeavens
perks.description: Gain 5% Omnivamp. Nearby Allied Heroes gain 4% Omnivamp.

perks.name: Perk_Kwang_TempestOfTheHeavens
perks.description: Strike of the Heavens deals 25% more damage and reduces Cooldowns by 25% more.

data.description: Rule the wasteland with Drongo, the mad tinkerer whose arsenal of explosive boomerangs and chemical warfare can control the battlefield and dismantle foes.

abilities.name: PistolShot
abilities.gameDescription: Ranged Basic Attack. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Tear through your enemies with your .45, Lucy.

abilities.name: OldRusty
abilities.gameDescription: Throw a boomerang that returns to you. • Deals {Damage}() Damage. • Slows them by {SlowPercent}% for {SlowDuration}s. • Repeats the effects when returning.
abilities.menuDescription: Throw a boomerang, dealing 45/65/85/105/125 (+55% )(+40%) physical damage to all Enemies hit and Slowing them by 30% for 1s. Upon hitting terrain or travelling max range, it returns and repeats the effects.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Throw a boomerang, dealing damage and slowing enemies. Repeat the effect when returning.

abilities.name: GagGrenade
abilities.gameDescription: Toss an explosive tear gas grenade. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • The explosion Silences for {Silence}s. • Lasts for {Duration}s, applying Wastelander every 0.3s.
abilities.menuDescription: Toss a tear gas grenade that explodes dealing 45/65/85/105/125 (+50%)(+100%) physical damage to Enemy Targets hit and silencing them for 0.8/0.9/1/1.1/1.2s. The gas lasts for 3s, applying Wastelander every 0.3s.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Toss a tear gas grenade that explodes dealing damage over time and silencing enemies.

abilities.name: RadRounds
abilities.gameDescription: Irradiates your Basic Attacks. • Basic Attacks apply Irradiate stacks for the next {Duration}s. • Irradiate lasts for 1.5s. • After Irradiate expires, deals {Damage}()Damage. • Deals {AdditionalShotsDamage}()Damage for each extra stack. • Applies a stack of Wastelander per Irradiate stack.
abilities.menuDescription: Irradiate Drongo's basic attacks for 4.5s. During this window, shots Irradiate Enemies for 1.5s, the timer refreshing with each hit. After Irradiate expires, the Target receives 30/40/50/60/70 (+50%) physical damage for the first stack, and 15/20/25/30/35 (+22%) for subsequent stacks. Applies an additional stack of Wastelander per Irradiate stack.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Load Lucy with radioactive rounds causing a buildup in enemies that deals damage after a duration.

abilities.name: ShrapnelCannon
abilities.gameDescription: Unleash a cannon blast in a forward cone. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Shreds their Physical Armor by {ShredPercent}% for {Duration}s. • Pushes Back Enemies in front of you. When used In-Air: • Launches you backwards. • Become briefly Unstoppable.
abilities.menuDescription: Unleash a bazooka blast, dealing 170/280/390 (+85% ) physical damage to all Enemies hit and shredding their armor by 30% for 4s. When used In-Air, the blast launches Drongo in the opposite direction, becoming briefly CC Immune and Pushing Back any Enemies in front of him.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Unleash a blast of shrapnel, dealing damage and reducing enemy armour. This attack when used In-Air sends you flying backwards.

abilities.name: Wastelander
abilities.gameDescription:
<Header>On Critical Strikes and Ability Hits:</> 
• Applies a <EffectText>Bleed</> to Enemies.
• Deals <AttackDamageText>{HealthPercent}% Maximum Health Damage</> over <AttackDamageText>{Duration}s</>.
• Reduced to <AttackDamageText>{MonsterPercent}%</> for <EffectText>Monsters</>.
abilities.menuDescription:
Drongo's Critical Strikes and Abilities also apply a Bleed to Enemies, dealing 2% of their maximum health as physical damage over 3s. 

Bleed Damage is reduced to 0.3% for Monsters.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Critical strikes and ability hits apply a bleed to enemies.

perks.name: Perk_Drongo_ExplodingRounds
perks.description: Rad Rounds deals 60% of its damage to nearby Enemies upon exploding.

perks.name: Perk_Drongo_FrequentUltimate
perks.description: Shrapnel Cannon's Cooldown is reduced by 85%, but it deals 60% less damage.

perks.name: Perk_Drongo_HealingGrenade
perks.description: While standing in Gag Grenade, Yourself and Allied Heroes restore for 60/105/150/195/240 (+120%)(+120%) Health over its lifetime.

data.description: Boris is a menacing diver that installs fear into his foes, hunting them down at distance with his extreme speed. Once near, utilize his mechanized claws to tear through opponents and slam them into the ground.

abilities.name: Maul
abilities.gameDescription: Melee Basic Attack. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.menuDescription: Melee basic attack dealing 57/59.66/62.46/65.41/68.5/71.73/75.1/78.61/82.27/86.07/90.01/94.1/98.33/102.7/107.21/111.86/116.66/121.6 (+80%) physical damage.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Maul your foes with your mechanized Claws.

abilities.name: ChronoSwipe
abilities.gameDescription: Dash forward, swiping twice: • Each hit deals {Damage}() Damage and applies On-Hit Effects.
abilities.menuDescription: Boris dashes forward, swiping all Enemies in his path twice. Each hit deals 20/30/40/50/60 (+44/48/52/56/60%) physical damage and applies On-Hit effects.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Lunge forward and swipe all Enemies in your path twice.

abilities.name: DetectionProtocol
abilities.gameDescription:
<Header> Sniff the air, Marking a nearby Enemy Hero:</>
• Prioritises the closest Hero to your reticle.
• Generates a <EffectText>Scent Trail</> to their location for <EffectText>{Duration}s</>.
• Gain <EffectText>{MovementSpeed}% Movement Speed</> while moving along the <EffectText>Trail</>.
• If no Hero is located, refunds <EffectText>{CooldownRefund}%</> of the <EffectText>Cooldown</>.

<Header>Damage the Target to consume the Mark:</>
• <CC_Text>Slows</> by <CC_Text>{Slow}%</> for <CC_Text>{SlowDuration}s</> and grants you <EffectText>{CanisterAmount} Canister</>.
abilities.menuDescription:
Boris sniffs the air, Marking a nearby Enemy Hero and generating a Scent Trail to their location for 7s. While moving along the Trail, Boris gains 45/55/65/75/85% Movement Speed. 

Dealing Hero Damage to the Marked Target consumes the Mark, ending the Trail effect, Slowing the Target by 35% for 1.25s and granting Boris 1 Canister.

If no Hero is found, 40% of the Cooldown is refunded.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Sniff the air, marking an enemy hero and generating a movement enhancing Scent Trail to them. Damaging the marked target slows them and grants you a Canister.

abilities.name: PrimevalRoar
abilities.gameDescription: Generate a defensive Barrier: • Gain {DamageReduction}% Damage Reduction for {Duration}s. • After the duration, the Barrier explodes. • The Barrier can be manually detonated after {MinReactivate}s. • Deals {Damage}() Damage to nearby Enemies. • Fears for {MinFear}-{MaxFear}s, based on Barrier duration.
abilities.menuDescription: Boris generates a defensive Barrier, granting him 24/28/32/36/40% Damage Reduction for 2.5s. After the duration, Boris roars, exploding the Barrier and dealing 80/100/120/140/160 (+50%) magical damage to all nearby Enemies. Enemies hit are Feared for 0.5-1s, based on Barrier duration. Boris may manually detonate the Barrier after 0.5s.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Generate a defensive barrier, granting you damage reduction. After the duration or upon reactivation, it explodes, damaging and causing all nearby enemies to run away in fear.

abilities.name: UrsineBurst
abilities.gameDescription: Dash forward and Grab an Enemy Hero: • Grab the first Enemy Hero you collide with. • Then leap up and slam the Target into the ground. • Deals {Damage}() Damage to Enemies in the landing zone. • Increased by {TargetHealth}% of the Target's Bonus Health. • Slows by {Slow}% for {SlowDuration}s.
abilities.menuDescription: Boris hovers momentarily, before Dashing forward and grabbing the first Enemy Hero he collides with. Boris then leaps into the air with the grabbed Hero and slams them to the ground. All Enemies in the landing zone take 280/390/500 (+180%) (+30/45/60% Target's Bonus Health) physical damage and are Slowed by 75% for 1.25s.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Dash forward, grabbing the first enemy hero you collide with. Then leap into the air and slam them into the ground, damaging and slowing all enemies in the landing zone.

abilities.name: TesseractDevice
abilities.gameDescription:
Damage Heroes & Monsters to generate Canisters: • Every second Basic Attack On-hit grants a Canister for {Duration}s. • Each granting {AttackSpeed}% Attack Speed and {Healing}() Healing On-Hit. • Max Canisters: {MaxStacks}.
At Max Canisters, unleash your Tesseract Core: • Zaps Enemies On-Hit, dealing {OnHitDamage}() Damage. • Restores {MaxHealing}() Health ({MonsterModifier}% effectiveness against Non-Heroes).
abilities.menuDescription: Every second Basic Attack On-Hit against Heroes & Monsters grants Boris a Canister for 5s, up to a maximum of 4. Each Canister grants Boris 7/10/13/16% attack speed and 0.5/0.8/1.1/1.4/1.7/2/2.3/2.6/2.9/3.2/3.5/3.8/4.1/4.4/4.7/5/5.3/5.6 (+3.5%)(+0.3 per Level) Healing On-Hit. At max Canisters, Boris unleashes his Tesseract Core. The Core zaps Enemies On-Hit, dealing 4 (+16%) magical damage and Healing Boris for 2.5/3.1/3.7/4.3/4.9/5.5/6.1/6.7/7.3/7.9/8.5/9.1/9.7/10.3/10.9/11.5/12.1/12.7 (+10%)(+0.6 per Level), reduced to 15% effectiveness against Non-Heroes.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Every second basic attack on-hit generates a Canister. Canisters give bonus attack speed and healing on-hit. At max Canisters, unleash your Tesseract Core, gaining additional on-hit damage and healing.

perks.name: Perk_Boris_ArmorPassive
perks.description: While Tesseract Core is active, gain 18% increased Armors.

perks.name: Perk_Boris_MarkShred
perks.description: Detection Protocol's Mark Shreds 40% Physical Armor for 5s when consumed.

perks.name: Perk_Boris_MaulPrey
perks.description: Chrono Swipe deals 70% more damage to Heroes below 20% Max Health.

data.description: Yurei is a spectral blade whose focused presence unnerves foes, utilizing swift movement and piercing kunai. Draw close to unleash Severance, separating spirit from vessel, before ending the conflict with disciplined finality.

abilities.name: Chakram
abilities.gameDescription: Melee Basic Attack. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Slice through foes, Body and Spirit.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.gameDescription: Throw three exploding projectiles. • Deal {Damage}()Damage • Apply Soul Rip to Heroes hit for {Duration}s.
abilities.menuDescription: Launch three projectiles that explode, each dealing 30/40/50/60/70 (+35%) damage to targets hit and apply Soul Rip to them for 4s.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Hurl three exploding Kunai that mark targets for Severance.

abilities.name: Spout
abilities.gameDescription: Perform a Spinning Soul Kick. • Deal {Damage}()Damage to nearby enemies. • Apply Soul Rip to Heroes hit for {Duration}s. • Restore {Healing}()Health. • Increased by up to {HealingMultiplier}% based on Missing Health. If cast in-air: • Leap upwards in current movement input direction.
abilities.menuDescription: Perform a spinning kick that deals 80/100/120/140/160 (+100%) physical damage to nearby enemies and apply Soul Rip to them for 4s. If cast in-air, you will additionaly leap upwards in your current movement direction. Heal 25/35/45/55/65 (+70%) health, increased by 0-60% based on missing health if an Enemy Hero or Monster is hit.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Perform a spinning kick to unleash souls, damaging, marking nearby enemies and healing you if they are a hero or monster. Casting in-air will cause you to leap upwards.

abilities.name: Tsunami
abilities.gameDescription: Launch Forwards. • Deal {Damage}()Damage. • Slows Enemies by {Slow}% for {SlowDuration}s. • Cooldown is reset upon consuming Soul Rip. Consumes Soul Rip to spawn a Soul for {Duration}s. • The Soul has {SoulHealth}% of their Maximum Health. • Shares Damage with the owner of the Soul.
abilities.menuDescription: Rush forwards, dealing 60/85/110/135/160 (+100%) physical damage to targets hit. Colliding with a target affected by Soul Rip consumes it to reset the cooldown of Severance and tear their Soul from the target for 4s. Souls linger around their hosts with 8% of their maximum health and share any damage dealt to them with their host. Consuming Soul Rip with a Soul still active will refresh its health.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Rush forwards cutting through enemies in your path. If marked, their spirit is seperated, sharing damage dealt to it back to its host.

abilities.name: Maelstrom
abilities.gameDescription: Summon a Raging Maelstrom for {Duration}s. • Deal {Damage}()Damage over the duration. • Apply Soul Rip to Targets hit for {MarkDuration}s. After the Duration: • Deal {FinalDamage}()Damage and Pull enemies towards you. • Consume Soul Rip to spawn a Soul of each target.
abilities.menuDescription: Channel for 1.5s, dealing 75/125/175 (+50%) physical damage to nearby enemies and applying Soul Rip to them. At the end of the duration, pull all targets towards you, tear their spirits and strike downwards, dealing 130/215/300 (+80%) physical damage and reset the cooldown of Severence.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Unleash a storm of souls, damaging and slowing nearby enemies before pulling them towards you, tearing their spirits from their body. Then perform a final downwards slash to strike all nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Riptide
abilities.gameDescription: Upon casting an Ability: • Gain {AttackSpeed}% Attack Speed for {Duration}s. • The next two Basic Attacks become Ranged. • Deal {Damage}()Bonus Damage • Bounce twice, dealing {BounceMultiplier}% damage.
abilities.menuDescription: Casting an ability grants you ranged (850u) basic attacks and 30/30/30/30/30/36/36/36/36/36/42/42/42/42/42/48/48/48% attack speed for the next two basic attacks. These attacks deal (+10%) bonus physical damage and bounce 2 times, dealing 15/15/15/15/15/20/20/20/20/20/25/25/25/25/25/30/30/30% damage to targets hit.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: After casting an ability, empower your blade for your next two attacks to launch soul wave projectiles that deal bonus damage and bounce between foes.

perks.name: Perk_Tidebinder_DefensiveUltimate
perks.description: Soul Storm grants 20% <EffectText>(+5% per Hero Hit)</> Damage Reduction while active, and its Cooldown is 8% lower.

perks.name: Perk_Tidebinder_EnhancedPassive
perks.description: Hallowed Strikes gains 150 additional range and bounces 2 more times.

perks.name: Perk_Tidebinder_SpiritSpeed
perks.description: Destroying Torn Spirits restores 5% of your Maximum Mana and grants 35% Decaying Movement Speed over 2.5s.

data.description: Challenge the heavens with Serath, a melee carry whose holy fury is unleashed in a spectacle of divine retribution, smiting foes with a celestial barrage that bathes the battlefield in fire.

abilities.name: AngelicSmite
abilities.gameDescription: Melee Basic Attack. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.menuDescription: Melee basic attack dealing 65/67.1/69.31/71.64/74.08/76.63/79.29/82.06/84.95/87.95/91.06/94.29/97.63/101.08/104.64/108.31/112.1/116 (+80%) physical damage.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Beat your foes into submission with your mace, The Nephilim.

abilities.name: Chastise
abilities.gameDescription: Clap your wings in front of you. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Slows by {Slow}% for {SlowDuration}s. • Resets your Basic Attack Cooldown.
abilities.menuDescription: Serath claps her wings in front of her dealing 90/120/150/180/210 (+80/85/90/95/100%) physical damage and applying a 35% Slow for 1.5s. Chastise cast speed increases with additional attack speed and resets Serath's basic attack cooldown on use.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Clap your wings in front of you dealing damage and slowing. Cast speed increases with attack speed.

abilities.name: HeavensFury
abilities.gameDescription: Disappear and dash to your Target. • Become CC Immune and Invulnerable. • Strike Enemies at your Target's location {NumberOfSlashes} times. • Strikes deal {Damage}()Damage. • Deals {ExtraAttackDamageReduction}% Damage for subsequent hits. • Strikes apply On-Hit Effects at {OnHitModifier}% effectiveness. • Monsters receive {MonsterDamage} additional Damage per strike. • Reappear at the Target's location.
abilities.menuDescription: Serath marks a Target and vanishes, striking Enemies at their location 5 times. Each strike deals 40/60/80/100/120 (+40%) physical damage and applies on-hit effects at 70% effectiveness. Additional strikes against the same Target deal 35% damage. On her final strike, Serath will teleport to the marked Target's location based on her current position. If the marked Target dies, Serath teleports immediately.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Mark a target and vanish, striking enemies at their location. Each strike deals damage. Then, teleport to the marked enemy's location.

abilities.name: Ascend
abilities.gameDescription: Rise up and target an area to attack. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Triggers automatically after {HoverTime}s.
abilities.menuDescription: Serath rises up into the air and hovers for up to 1.8s. During this time, she can target an area up to 1350 units away. Upon confirmation, she dives down and deals 95/120/145/170/195 (+100%) physical damage. Serath automatically dives to the ground after 1.8s
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Rise up into the air and hover while targetting an area. Then, dive down and deal damage.

abilities.name: Heresey
abilities.gameDescription: Take demonic form to gain immense power for {Duration}s. • Deals {Damage}()Damage around you. • Gain {Movespeed}% Movement Speed. • Gain {Attackspeed}% Attack Speed. Grants Infernal Strikes: • Deal {BurnDamage}()Damage On-Hit over {BurnDuration}s.
abilities.menuDescription: Serath takes demonic form, dealing 60/90/120 (+50%) physical damage to nearby Enemies and setting them ablaze. For the next 7s, she gains 12% movement speed, 20/40/60% attack speed, and empowers her basic attack with Infernal Strikes. Infernal Strikes sets Enemy Units ablaze on-hit, dealing 30/50/70 (+25%) true damage on-hit over 4s.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Take on your demonic form, dealing damage to nearby enemies and setting them ablaze. Gain movement speed, attack speed, and damage over time on your basic attacks.

abilities.name: FallenGrace
abilities.gameDescription:
<Header>On Hero Takedown:</>
• The Hero drops a demonic visage for <EffectText>10s</>.
• Upon touching it, activate <AbilityName>Heresy</> at no cost. 
• Reduces current <EffectText>Basic Ability Cooldowns</> by <EffectText>{CooldownReduction}%</>.
abilities.menuDescription:
Takedowns on Enemy Heroes leave behind a demonic visage for 10s.

Upon touching it, Serath activates Heresy at no cost and reduces her current basic ability cooldowns by 65%.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Takedowns on heroes leave behind an orb. Upon touching it, activate Heresy and reduce your current basic ability cooldowns.

perks.name: Perk_Serath_CrushingDescent
perks.description: Ascend now Stuns for 0.25s when it deals damage.

perks.name: Perk_Serath_VitalResonance
perks.description: Fallen Grace's Visages restore (+170%) Health on pick-up.

perks.name: Perk_Serath_WrathUnleashed
perks.description: Serath gains 20/25/30% Critical Chance while Heresy is active.

data.description: Yin is a nimble short range carry who dances through battles with her enchanted whip. She weaves a whirlwind of attacks, controlling the flow of combat with swift strikes and fluid movement.

abilities.name: Whip
abilities.gameDescription: Melee Basic Attack: • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.menuDescription: Melee basic attack dealing 57/59.1/61.31/63.64/66.08/68.63/71.29/74.06/76.95/79.95/83.06/86.29/89.63/93.08/96.64/100.31/104.1/108 (+75%) physical damage.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Your whip sings through the air, a graceful extension of your will, striking with honed precision.

abilities.name: WhipCrack
abilities.gameDescription: Crack your whip forming a sphere of pressure. • Deals {Damage}()Physical Damage instantly. • Pushback Targets hit. • Reflects Enemy projectiles for the next {Duration}s.
abilities.menuDescription: Yin cracks her whip, Pushing away nearby Enemies. Deals 90/120/150/180/210 (+100%) physical damage and creates a sphere of pressure around her for 0.8s. If Enemy projectiles hit the sphere, they are reflected toward the target location.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Master the art of deflection by redirecting enemy projectiles and dealing damage to nearby enemies that pushes them back.

abilities.name: LashKick
abilities.gameDescription: Swing your whip and attach it to Target location. • Upon hitting an Enemy or Terrain, Dash to the location. • Upon arrival, deal {Damage}()Physical Damage. • Slows by {Slow}% for {SlowDuration}s. • Then Leap in current movement direction.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: With a flick, your whip becomes a tether, propelling you towards an enemy target or terrain.

abilities.name: ReachingPain
abilities.gameDescription:
Passive: Every third successful consecutive Basic Attack deals {PercentDamage}%() Maximum Health Damage and restores {Healing}() Health.
Extend your whip. • Increase Attack Range to 1100 units. • Gain 100% Cleave for {Duration}s.
abilities.menuDescription:
Passive: Every third successful consecutive basic attack will deal 3/3.75/4.5/5.25/6% of the target’s maximum health as bonus physical damage and heals Yin for 10/12.5/15/17.5/20%.

Active: Yin extends her whip, increasing the range of her basic attack to 1100 units 
and gaining 100% cleave for 6s.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Channel the wind's fury, extending your whip's reach and gaining the ability to cleave through multiple enemies with increased force.

abilities.name: QuellingGale
abilities.gameDescription:
<Header>Surround yourself in gale winds.</>
• Lasts <EffectText>{Duration}s</>.
• <CC_Text>Slows</> Enemies within by <CC_Text>{SlowPercent}%</>.
• Gain <EffectText>{MoveSpeed}% Movement Speed</> within.
• Enemy projectiles are <EffectText>Halted</>.
abilities.menuDescription:
Yin surrounds herself in gale winds.

For 5s, the winds will apply a 10% Slow to Enemies within and grants Yin 10% movement speed. 
Enemy projectiles that travel through it are halted.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Summon a raging vortex that ensnares and halts enemy projectiles, slows them down and grants you increased movement speed.

abilities.name: RisingStorm
abilities.gameDescription:
<Header>Basic Attacks against Heroes or Monsters grant Stacks:</>
• Stacks up to <EffectText>{MaxStacks}</> times and lasts <EffectText>{Duration}s</>.
• Each Stack grants <EffectText>{AttackSpeed}%</> Attack Speed. 
• Damaging Enemies with <AbilityName>Lash Kick</> grants <EffectText>{Stacks}</> Stacks.
abilities.menuDescription:
Yin’s basic attacks against Heroes or Monsters grant her a stack of Rising Storm per Target hit for 3s, stacking up to 8 times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent attacks. 

Each stack grants 3/4/5/6% attack speed, for a maximum of 24/32/40/48% attack speed.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Dealing damage builds up stacking attack speed. Go too long without dealing damage and this effect ends.

perks.name: Perk_Yin_DeflectBuff
perks.description: Deflecting a projectile grants 20% Decaying Movement Speed over 2s and a 44-350 Shield for 3s.

perks.name: Perk_Yin_EnhancedReach
perks.description: Windburn lasts for 1s longer and grants <HealthText>(+1% Missing Health)</> Healing On-Hit while active. Healing is 15% effective against Non-Heroes.

perks.name: Perk_Yin_LashTerrain
perks.description: Lash Kick's Cooldown is reduced by 50% when used on Terrain.

data.description: Let arrows fly with Sparrow, a ranger whose bowmanship pierces through enemy defences, delivering a flurry of feathered death from afar.

abilities.name: BowShot
abilities.gameDescription: Ranged Basic Attack. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Fire precision arrows at your enemies with your bow, Heartpiercer.

abilities.name: PiercingShot
abilities.gameDescription: Charge a powerful piercing arrow. • Reaches maximum power after {MaxChargeTime}s. • Deals up to {Damage}()Damage. • Damage increases by {IncreasedPercent}% per Relentless stack. • Deals {SecondaryPercent}% Damage to Targets beyond the first. • Pierces through all Units and Terrain.
abilities.menuDescription: Charge a Terrain piercing arrow, reaching 50-100% maximum power after 1s and dealing up to 100/140/180/220/260 (+140/145/150/155/160%) physical damage to all Enemies in its path. Targets afflicted by Relentless receive 8% additional damage per stack and Targets beyond the first take 60% damage.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Charge a long range terrain piercing arrow that deals damage to all enemies in its path.

abilities.name: HailOfArrows
abilities.gameDescription: Release a volley of arrows raining down over 2.5s. • Deal {Damage}()Damage over 8 hits. • Slows by {SlowPercent}% for {SlowDuration}s.
abilities.menuDescription: Release a volley of arrows that rain down over 2.5s, dealing 100/130/160/190/220 (+100%) physical damage to all Enemies in the area over 8 hits. Enemies struck by Hail Of Arrows are Slowed by 30/32.5/35/37.5/40% for 0.5s.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Release a storm of arrows that rain down, dealing damage and slowing all enemies in the area.

abilities.name: HeightenedSenses
abilities.gameDescription: Focus your mind, becoming empowered. • Gain {Percent}% Attack Speed for {Duration}s. • Every 2nd Basic Attack against a Target deals {Damage}()Bonus Damage. • This Bonus Damage applies a stack of Relentless.
abilities.menuDescription: Sparrow focuses her mind, gaining 30/35/40/45/50% attack speed for 6s. Every second subsequent basics attack against the same target while Heightened Senses is active deals (+25%) bonus physical damage and applies an additional stack of Relentless.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Focus your mind, gaining attack speed for a duration. Every second basic attack against the same target will deal increased damage.

abilities.name: InnerFire
abilities.gameDescription: Unleash a barrage of arrows. • Fires {MaxShots} volleys over {Duration}s. • Center arrows deal {Damage}()Damage. • Side arrows deal {SideDamage}()Damage. • Arrows Pierce through Units. • Arrows apply On-Hit Effects at {OnHitModifier}% efficiency. • Arrows can Critically Strike.
abilities.menuDescription: Unleash a barrage of fanned arrows, firing 12/14/16 volleys over 3.5s. The center arrow deals (+70%). Side arrows deal (+58%) damage instead. Inner Fire's arrows pierce Enemy Units, can Critically Strike and apply On-Hit effects at 30% effectiveness.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Invoke your blazing spirit, augmenting Heartpiercer to release a fan of piercing arrows over a short duration.

abilities.name: Relentless
abilities.gameDescription:
<Header>On successful Ability hits and Basic Attacks:</>
• Apply a stack of <EffectText>Relentless</> to Targets for <EffectText>{Duration}s</>.
• For each stack, deal <HealthText>{HealthPercent}% Target's Maximum Health</> as <AttackDamageText>Damage</> <EffectText>On-Hit</>.
• Max Stacks per Target: <EffectText>{NumStacks}</>.
abilities.menuDescription:
Sparrow's Basic Attacks and Abilities apply stacks of Relentless to Enemy Units. 

Her Basic Attacks against Targets afflicted by Relentless deal an additional 0.4% of their maximum health as bonus physical damage On-Hit, per stack.

Relentless stacks last for 3s, stacking up to 6 times.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Dealing damage applies stacks of Relentless to enemy targets. Deal additional damage to enemies with Relentless stacks.

perks.name: Perk_Sparrow_EndlessHunt
perks.description: Takedowns reset Sparrow's Basic Ability Cooldowns and permanently grant 1 Physical Penetration.

perks.name: Perk_Sparrow_Vanish
perks.description: Upon activating Heightened Senses, Sparrow enters Stealth and gains 30% Movement Speed for 1.5s.

perks.name: Perk_Sparrow_HuntressVolley
perks.description: Inner Fire now releases a fan of 5 arrows, has 8% more range, and fires 2 more volleys.

data.description: Tear up the battlefield with pure power or take control with slows and displacements, with the ultimate flexible Hero pair, Grim.exe!

abilities.name: PulseCannon
abilities.gameDescription: Ranged Basic Attack. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Fire deadly bolts of electricity at your enemies with The Inverter.

abilities.name: DeflectorShield
abilities.gameDescription:
<Header>Activate an Energy Shield.</>
• Persists for <EffectText>{Duration}s</>.
• Blocks the next Enemy Ability.
• Restores <ManaText>{ManaRestore}% Missing Mana</> upon successful block.
abilities.menuDescription:
Grim.exe activates a shield for 1.5s that blocks the next incoming enemy ability.

If the shield successfully blocks an enemy ability, Grim.exe restores 15/20/25/30/35% of his missing mana.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Activate a shield that blocks the next enemy ability.

abilities.name: DisplacementBlast
abilities.gameDescription:
Fire an Empowered Blast. • Deals {Damage}()Damage.
When in Assault Mode: • Shot becomes Lobbed and explodes on Impact. • Pushes Back from the centre of the explosion.
abilities.menuDescription: Fire an empowered shot forward that deals 100/140/180/220/260 (+120%)(+80%) magical damage. In Assault Mode, the shot is Lobbed and displaces Enemies away from the centre of the explosion.
abilities.simplifiedDescription:
Fire an empowered shot forward that deals damage.
In Assault Mode, the shot displaces enemies.

abilities.name: AssaultMode
abilities.gameDescription:
Augment Basic Attacks with Sentry Mode: • Restore {Mana} Mana. • Grant {AttackSpeed}% Attack Speed for {Duration}s, stacking up to 4 times.
Gain Explosive Basic Attacks with Assault Mode: • Deal {Damage}() Damage On-Hit. • Slow Targets by {Slow}% for {SlowDuration}s. • Deal {Cleave}% Damage to nearby Targets.
abilities.menuDescription: Sentry Mode: Basic Attacks restore 8 mana and grant 5/7/9/11/13% for 2.5s, stacking up to 4 times. Stacks fall off individually. Assault Mode: Pulse Cannon shots cost 30 mana, deal (+10%)(+10%) bonus magical damage on-hit, cleave for 20/40/60/80/100% damage and apply a 10% decaying Slow for 0.8s.
abilities.simplifiedDescription:
Swap between Assault and Sentry Mode.
Sentry: Basic Attacks restore mana.
Assault: Basic Attacks cost mana, deal extra damage, and slow.

abilities.name: G.T.F.O
abilities.gameDescription: Gyro Targeted Force Orb: • Deals {Damage}() Damage. • Follows the Target no matter the range. • Passes through Terrain. • Collides with Enemy Heroes.
abilities.menuDescription: Grim.exe slows himself by 60% and locks onto an enemy hero. After a short channel, a Gyro Targeted Force Orb is launched. The Orb will pass through the world and non-hero units, but can be blocked by enemy heroes. The Orb deals 300/480/660 (+140%)(+105%) magical damage.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Lock onto an enemy hero and launch an orb that passes through all terrain dealing massive damage.

abilities.name: Pulsefire
abilities.gameDescription:
• Basic Attacks are modified to deal Magical Damage.
On dealing damage to an Enemy Unit: • Apply Pulsefire to them for {Duration}s. • The next instance of damage deals {Damage}()Damage. • Pulsefire is consumed upon dealing damage. • Pulsefire cannot be applied to the same Target for {Cooldown}s.
abilities.menuDescription: Grim.exe’s basic attacks are modified to deal Magical Damage. Grim.exe’s basic attacks and abilities apply Pulsefire to Enemies hit for 4s. The next basic attack or ability will burst the Pulsefire and deal 10 (+12%)(+22%) true damage on-hit.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Your basic attacks and abilities apply Pulsefire to Enemies. The next basic attack or ability will burst the Pulsefire dealing damage.

perks.name: Perk_Grim_InstantReload
perks.description: GTFO now Executes Heroes that fall below 5% Max Health. When this occurs, GTFO may be re-cast for 8s.

perks.name: Perk_Grim_QuickRestart
perks.description: Triggering Pulsefire reduces your Current Basic Ability Cooldowns by 10%, increased to 25% against Heroes.

perks.name: Perk_Grim_SystemRestore
perks.description: Blocking an Ability with Energy Shield restores 20 (+10%) Health and grants 20% Decaying Movement Speed over 2s.

data.description: Wield ancient techniques as Feng Mao, a melee fighter whose precise, whirlwind strikes and teleportation skills cut through the chaos of combat.

abilities.name: Sweep
abilities.gameDescription: Melee Basic Attack. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Slice through enemies with your glaive, Windwalker.

abilities.name: ReapingDash
abilities.gameDescription: Blink forward, hitting everything in your path. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Deals an extra {BonusDamage}()% Current Health Damage. • Cooldown is reset upon achieving a Takedown.
abilities.menuDescription: Dash forward, dealing 60/75/90/105/120 (+40%)(+7% of the target's current health} physical damage to all Enemies in Feng Mao's path, and in a small area around the target location. Cooldown resets when acheiving a takedown.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Teleport forward, dealing damage to everything in your path.

abilities.name: Safeguard
abilities.gameDescription:
<Header>Create a Spellshield.</>
• Gain a <EffectText>Spellshield</> for <EffectText>{Duration}s</>.
• Blocking an Ability doubles the passive stat gain
   for <EffectText>{StatDuration}s</>.

<EffectText>Passive: </>Gain <AttackDamageText>{Power} Physical Power</> and <EffectText>{MoveSpeed}% Movement Speed</>.
abilities.menuDescription:
Gain a Spellshield for 1.5s. Blocking an ability doubles the passive stat gain for 5s.

Passive: Gain 8/11/14/17/20 physical power and 3/4.5/6/7.5/9% movement speed.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Envelop yourself with a Spellshield that blocks the next ability hit and grants you additional power and movement speed.

abilities.name: Hamstring
abilities.gameDescription: Spin your Glaive twice in a circle around you. • Each hit deals {Damage}()Damage. • Slows by {Percent}% for {SlowDuration}s. • Each hit deals {BonusDamage}()Bonus Damage if only one Target is damaged.
abilities.menuDescription: Feng Mao swings his glaive twice, each time dealing 40/60/80/100/120 (+30%) physical damage to all Enemies around him, Slowing them by 30% for 1s. Each hit's damage is increased by 15/25/35/45/55 (+20%) if only one target is hit.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Spin twice, dealing damage and slowing all enemies around you. Isolated targets take more damage.

abilities.name: EarthShatter
abilities.gameDescription: Leap into a forward line attack. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • If a Hero is below {Execute}()Health, Execute them. • Upon Executing a Hero gain a recast of Earth Shatter. • The recast has no cost and must be used within {ExecuteTimer}s.
abilities.menuDescription: Feng Mao slams his glaive into the ground, dealing 250/350/450 (+70%) physical damage to all Enemies in the area. If an Enemy is below 300/480/660 (+70%) (+520%) health, execute them. Upon executing an Enemy Hero, Earth Shatter may be recast within 12s at no cost.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Slam the ground, causing massive spikes to rise up. This deals damage and executes any enemy below the threshold.

abilities.name: PrecisionStrike
abilities.gameDescription: Unique Hero Takedowns increase Power. • Current Bonus Physical Power: {Power}(). • Remaining Targets: {Targets}.
abilities.menuDescription: Upon achieving 1/3/5 Unique Hero Takedowns, permanently gain 5/10/18% bonus physical power.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Unique Hero Takedowns permanently grant physical power.

perks.name: Perk_FengMao_ImperialDuelist
perks.description: Your Basic Attacks debuff Targets for 3s. Against debuffed Targets, deal 5% more damage and take 5% less damage.

perks.name: Perk_FengMao_OnKillSustain
perks.description: Killing Enemy Units restores 3.5% of Missing Health, increased to 35% for Earth Shatter Executions.

perks.name: Perk_FengMao_SeismicSmash
perks.description: Earth Shatter also Knocks Up Enemies and Stuns for a short duration.

abilities.name: Clobber
abilities.gameDescription: Melee Basic Attack. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Bludgeon enemies with your wooden fist.

abilities.name: Grasp
abilities.gameDescription: Prepare to unleash your vines. • Channel for 3s, reaching max Range after 1s. • 50% Cooldown if cancelled or when the 3s Channel expires. • Slows self by {SelfSlow}% whilst channeling. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Pull Enemies towards your location. • Slows by {Slow}% for {SlowDuration}s.
abilities.menuDescription: Channel for up to 3s, Slowing yourself by 25% and wind up your vines, increasing their range over 1s. After 3s the ability will be cancelled and go on a 50% cooldown. Confirm to unleash the vines that will collide with the first enemy target hit dealing 90/135/180/225/270 (+85%) magical damage, Pulling them towards Mourn and Slowing them by 90% for 0.75s.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Wind up powerful vines that launch forward, damaging and pulling the first unfortunate enemy target hit towards you.

abilities.name: Bastion
abilities.gameDescription: Vomit bugs at nearby Heroes & Monsters. Allies: • Restore {Healing}()Health over {Duration}s. • Gain {PhysicalArmor} Physical Armor and {MagicalArmor} Magical Armor. Enemies: • Take {Damage}()Damage over {DamageDuration}s. • Lose {Shred} + {PercentShred}% Physical Armor and {Shred} + {PercentShred}% Magical Armor.
abilities.menuDescription: Mourn vomits magical bugs that attach to nearby Heroes and Monsters. Mourn and Allied Heroes hit restore 4/6.5/9/11.5/14 (+7%) health every 0.5s for 3s, gaining 5 (+8% Physical Armor) Physical Armor and 5 (+8% Magical Armor) Magical Armor for the same duration. Enemies take 8/12/16/20/24 (+10%) magical damage every 0.5s for 3s and have their Base Physical Armor and Base Magical Armor reduced by 5 and their Bonus Physical Armor and Bonus Magical Armor reduced by 15%.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Vomit bugs that heal and protect Allied Heroes whilst damaging and shredding Enemies.

abilities.name: Depart
abilities.gameDescription: Project a dreadful light. • Channel a light for up to {Duration}s. • The Radius and Mesmerize increase with channel time. • Slows self by {Slow}% and gain {DR}% Damage Reduction. After the duration, the light erupts: • Deals {Damage}()Damage to all Enemies within. • Mesmerizes Enemies hit for {MinimumCharmDuration}-{CharmDuration}s.
abilities.menuDescription: Mourn channels energy into his fist, expanding up to 800u over the duration for 1.5s, gaining 20% Damage Reduction and Slows himself by 30%. At the end of the duration or upon reactivation, enemies within take 90/120/150/180/210 (+50%) magical damage and are Mesmerized for 0.45-1.1s (based on channel duration).
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Channel energy, slowing yourself but gaining damage reduction. After the duration or upon reactivation, damage and mesmerize nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Nearsight
abilities.gameDescription:
<Header>Absorb all Light.</>
• Lasts <EffectText>{Duration}s</>.
• Enemy Heroes have massively reduced <EffectText>Vision</>.
• Gain <EffectText>{MovementSpeed}% Movement Speed</>.
abilities.menuDescription:
Mourn absorbs light from the map for 4s, causing all Enemy Heroes to have massively reduced vision.

During this time Mourn gains 40/60/80% movement speed.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Absorb all light from the galaxy, preventing Enemy Heroes from seeing beyond a small radius and granting yourself movement speed for the duration.

abilities.name: Pulverise
abilities.gameDescription: Your next Basic Attack is enhanced: • Gain 100% Cleave. • Deals {Damage}()Damage to all Targets hit. • Restores {Healing}()Health.
abilities.menuDescription: Mourn's next basic attack will instead deal 20/28/36/44/52/60/68/76/84/92/100/108/116/124/132/140/148/156 (+50%)(+7% ) magical damage to all targets hit. Damaging an Enemy Target will restore (3/5/7/9% Maximum Health) Health.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Swipe with a magical vine that damages enemies, absorbing their essence, healing Mourn.

perks.name: Perk_Wood_ContagionUlt
perks.description: Eclipse applies Contagion to all Heroes on activation.

perks.name: Perk_Wood_ExtractCDR
perks.description: Casting an Ability reduces the Cooldown of Extract by 20%.

perks.name: Perk_Wood_TerrainHookshot
perks.description: If Abduct hits Terrain, Mourn pulls himself towards it.

data.description: Roll into action as Maco, a mischevious and adorable Chitterkin with an insatiable desire to collect anything and everything shiny while making friends along the way.

abilities.name: Primary
abilities.gameDescription: Ranged Basic Attack. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}. • For each successful Basic Attack, gain up to {MaxStacks} stacks. • At max stacks, the next Ability's Cooldown is reduced {CDR}s.
abilities.menuDescription: Ranged basic attack dealing 57/59.73/62.61/65.63/68.8/72.11/75.57/79.18/82.93/86.84/90.88/95.07/99.41/103.9/108.53/113.31/118.23/123.3 (+55%) physical damage. Additionally, Maco gains a stack each time he successfully Basic Attacks an Enemy, up to a max of 4. At max stacks, Maco's next ability's Cooldown is reduced by 1s and all stacks are removed.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Fling small gemstones at Enemies, gaining stacks per successful hit. At max stacks, spend them to reduce the cooldown of your next ability.

abilities.name: Shockbolt
abilities.gameDescription: Fire a slow-moving, explosive gemstone. • Launch a gem that explodes, dealing {Damage}()Damage. • Stuns Enemies hit in a small area for {MinStun}s. • Distance increases Stun duration up to {MaxStun}s. • Can be reactivated to detonate the gem early.
abilities.menuDescription: Maco throws a slow-moving gemstone that explodes at its max range, or when detonated early by reactivating the ability. When the gemstone explodes, it deals 70/95/120/145/170 (+45%) magical damage and Stuns Enemies for 0.5s. Stun Duration increases up to 1.1/1.15/1.2/1.25/1.3s based on distance.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Throw a slow, explosive gemstone to damage and Stun Enemies. Can be reactivated early.

abilities.name: Witherbomb
abilities.gameDescription: Lob a gem that hurts Enemies and Heals Allies. • The gem explodes on contact, dealing {Damage}()Damage. • If the explosion hits Allies, they Heal for {Heal}(). • Allies also Heal for {HealAllyHPScaling}% of their Max Health. • Allies gain {MS}%() Movement Speed for {MSDuration}s. Passive: Hitting Heroes with Abilities Heals you {SelfHeal}().
abilities.menuDescription: Active: Maco lobs a gemstone that hurts or heals depending on the Target hit. If Maco hits an Ally, they are Healed for 50/70/90/110/130 (+35%) Health in addition to 1/1.5/2/2.5/3% of their Max Health. Allies also gain 10/12/14/16/18 (+3%) Movement Speed for 3s. If Maco hits an Enemy, they take 75/110/145/180/215 (+45%) magical damage. Maco cannot hit himself with this ability. Passive: Hitting either Allied or Enemy Heroes with any ability Heals you for 20/30/40/50/60 (+3%) (+0.4%) Health. Using this ability costs Health instead of Mana.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Lob a gemstone that damages Enemies and Heals Allies, additionally granting them Movement Speed.

abilities.name: LeapSmash
abilities.gameDescription: Leap high in the sky, slamming into the ground. • On landing, deal {Damage}()Damage in an area. • Additionally, Enemies are Slowed by {Slow}%() for {SlowDuration}s. • Hitting an Enemy Hero grants a {Shield}() Shield for {ShieldDuration}s.
abilities.menuDescription: Maco leaps high into the air before slamming back down to the ground with his gemstone, dealing 75/105/135/165/195 (+80%) magical damage to Enemies and Slowing them by 30% (+5%) for 1.5s. If Maco hits an Enemy Hero, he gains a 60/115/170/225/280 (+40%) (+6.5%) Health Shield for 3.5s. After landing, Maco dashes slightly in the direction he is currently moving.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Leap high into the air and crush enemies with your giant gem, damaging and Slowing Enemies. Gain a Shield for hitting Enemy Heroes.

abilities.name: Strike
abilities.gameDescription: Send a giant gem flying, running over Enemies. • Charge for up to {Charge}s, increasing the gem's range. • Enemies take {Damage}()Damage, are Pushed, and Stunned. • Explodes at max range, dealing {ExplosionDamage}()Damage. • The explosion also Stuns Enemies for {StunMin}-{StunMax}s, based on charge time.
abilities.menuDescription: Maco charges up his gemstone for up to 1s, increasing the range it travels. When Maco releases the charged gemstone, it barrels forward along the ground, dealing 80/130/180 (+35%) magical damage and Pushing and Stunning all Enemies it hits along with it. At the gemstone's max range, it explodes, dealing 120/195/270 (+65%) magical damage and Stunning all Enemies hit for {Strike_StunDuration}s.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Charge up and send a giant gemstone flying, damaging and Pushing Enemy Heroes. The gemstone then explodes, damaging and Stunning in an area.

abilities.name: Passive
abilities.gameDescription:
<Header>Gain extra momentum while moving.</>
• While moving, gain up to <EffectText>{MS}% Movement Speed</>.
• At max speed, gain <EffectText>Slow Immunity</>.
• Taking Damage from Heroes removes all buffs after <EffectText>{Falloff}s</>.
• Buffs are also removed after standing still.
abilities.menuDescription:
As Maco moves, he gains stacks of Movement Speed up to 15% (+0.75% per level).

When Maco reaches 25 stacks, he gains Mach Speed, which grants him Slow Immunity.

After taking Damage from Enemy Heroes or standing still, he retains all buffs for 2.5s before they are removed.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Gain Movement Speed while moving, gaining Slow Immunity at max stacks. Stacks removed on being hit by an Enemy Hero.

perks.name: Perk_Swiftpaw_FerociousFlight
perks.description: For each Enemy hit by Maco Fly, Maco gains 30/50/70/90/110 (+12.5%)(+1.5%) additional Shielding and the ability's Cooldown is reduced by 1s. This effect also occurs on non-Heroes, but is reduced by 80%.

perks.name: Perk_Swiftpaw_Longshot
perks.description: Maco Sparkle's damage scales linearly based on how far it travels from 100% to 200% damage.

perks.name: Perk_Swiftpaw_Shatterbloom
perks.description: Maco Strike creates a Healing field at the explosion location that Heals 15/25/35 (+4%) every 0.25s for 5s.

data.description: Aurora specialises in bitterly cold crowd control, freezing her opponents in their tracks while dancing around the battlefield with her arctic agility.

abilities.name: FrozenSword
abilities.gameDescription: Melee Basic Attack. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}. • Deals {OnHitDamage}()Damage On-Hit.
abilities.menuDescription: Melee basic attack dealing 62/65.01/68.18/71.51/75.01/78.66/82.48/86.46/90.6/94.9/99.36/103.98/108.76/113.71/118.81/124.08/129.51/135.1 (+75%) physical damage. Additionally deals (+25%) magical damage on-hit.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Slice through your enemies with your sword, Shatter.

abilities.name: BorealSweep
abilities.gameDescription: Sweep forward to freeze the ground • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Slows by {Slow}% for {SlowDuration}s. The frost explodes after 1s: • Deals {ExplosionDamage}()Damage.
abilities.menuDescription: Aurora summons a wave of frost in a cone dealing 40/55/70/85/100 (+35%) magical damage and Slowing Enemy Targets hit by 30% for 1s. After 1s the wave erupts, dealing an additional 80/110/140/170/200 (+70%) magical damage.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Summon a wave of frost dealing damage and slowing. The frost then explodes, dealing damage again.

abilities.name: GlacialCharge
abilities.gameDescription:
<Header>Dash forward in a line.</> 
• Leaves behind a walkable <EffectText>Wall</> in your path.
• The <EffectText>Wall</> lasts <EffectText>{Duration}s</>.
• Allies gain <EffectText>{MovementSpeed}% Movement Speed</> on the <EffectText>Wall</>.
• Recasting this ability will destroy the <EffectText>Wall</> early.
abilities.menuDescription:
Aurora dashes forward, leaving behind a trail of ice that other Heroes can walk on for the next 5s.

Allied Heroes gain 25/30/35/40/45% increased movement speed when walking on the ice.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Dash forward and leave behind a trail of ice that increases allied movement speed.

abilities.name: Hoarfrost
abilities.gameDescription: Create a Ring of Frost. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Roots for {Root}s. • The Ring of Frost persists for {Duration}s.
abilities.menuDescription: Aurora creates a ring of frost on the ground around her. Enemies that touch the ring take 80/125/170/215/260 (+50%) magical damage and are Rooted for 1s. The ring remains in the world for 2.5s.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Create a ring of frost that deals damage and roots enemies.

abilities.name: Cryoseism
abilities.gameDescription: Freeze enemies around you. • Slows by {Slow}% for {SlowDuration}s. • Then, Stuns for {Stun}s. • After, deals {Damage}()Damage around the Target. Enemies damaged by the explosion of Cryoseism: • Slowed by {SecondarySlow}% for {SecondarySlowDuration}s. • Then, deal {SecondaryDamage}()Damage around the Target.
abilities.menuDescription: Aurora freezes an area, applying a 50% Slow to all Enemies for 1.5s. After 1.5s, the ice freezes, Stunning the target for 1s. After the Stun, the Target explodes dealing 200/300/400 (+70%) magical damage to them and nearby Enemies. Enemies damaged by Cryoseism will be Slowed by 50% for 0.5s before exploding, dealing 80/120/160 (+28%) magical damage to them and nearby Enemies. Targets can only be slowed this way once per Cryoseism.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Freezes an area slowing enemies. After the slow enemies explode dealing damage and chaining the effect to those hit.

abilities.name: FrozenSimulacrum
abilities.gameDescription: Jump while mid-air to create a Replica for {Duration}s: • The Replica has {Health}() Health and takes Tower aggro. • Immobilizing a Hero reduces the Cooldown by {CDR}s. Upon damaging a Hero or Monster 4 times: • Summon a Frost Storm for {AoEDuration}s. • Deals {Damage}()(+{HealthPercent}% Target's Max Health) Damage per second.
abilities.menuDescription: Aurora can jump whilst airborne to leap in the direction she is moving, leaving behind a Replica of herself. This cooldown is reduced by 4s when Immobilizing Heroes. The Replica has (+20%)(+150%) Health, will draw aggro from Enemy Towers, and lasts for 8s. Damaging an Enemy Hero or Monster 4 times will summon a Frost Storm around Aurora for 3s, refreshing on additional damage dealt. The Storm deals 5 (+30%) +1/1.2/1.4/1.6/1.8/2/2.2/2.4/2.6/2.8/3/3.2/3.4/3.6/3.8/4/4.2/4.4% (+0.2% per level) Enemy Max Health magical damage per second.
abilities.simplifiedDescription:
Jump whilst airborne to leap in the direction of motion, leaving behind a Statue.

Damaging enemies summons a Frost Storm that deals damage.

perks.name: Perk_Aurora_DeepFreeze
perks.description: Cryoseism's area of effect is 20% larger.

perks.name: Perk_Aurora_FrozenFury
perks.description: Frost Storm grants 10-34% Attack Speed while active. Increases with Hero Level.

perks.name: Perk_Aurora_IceAge
perks.description: Glacial Charge travels 25% further.

abilities.name: Rifle
abilities.gameDescription: Ranged Basic Attack. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.menuDescription: Ranged basic attack dealing 57/58.68/60.45/62.31/64.26/66.3/68.43/70.65/72.96/75.36/77.85/80.43/83.1/85.86/88.71/91.65/94.68/97.8 (+70%) physical damage.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Ignite the battlefield with Starfire's celestial fury.

abilities.name: Trace
abilities.gameDescription: Hypercharge Starfire. • Lasts {Duration}s and Refreshes on Takedown. • Deals {Damage}()Damage per hit. • Applies On-Hit Effects at {OnHitModifier}% effectiveness. • Heroes take {DamageRamp}% more Damage per hit. Max: 25%. • Deal (+{Pen}% Enemy Physical Armor) Damage at Max Stacks. Passive: Basic Attacks deal {PassiveDamage}()Damage on-hit.
abilities.menuDescription: Skylar hypercharges Starfire for 5s (refreshes on hero takedown): Convert bonus attack speed into on-hit physical damage and attack at a fixed rate of 10 attacks per second. Damage is modified to 1/3/5/7/9 (+10%)(+4%)(+11%) per instance and applies on-hit effects at 10% effectiveness. Dealing Damage to the same target within 1s increases the damage by 1.25%, stacking up to 25 times. At maximum stacks, deal damage equal to 6/9/12/15/18% of the targets Bonus Physical Armor. Passive: Basic Attacks deal 4/8/12/16/20 (+10% ) bonus physical damage on-hit.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Hypercharge Starfire to instead project a beam that deals massive single target damage.

abilities.name: NanoBubble
abilities.gameDescription: Launch a bouncing nano bubble: • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attaches to the first Target hit for {Delay}s. After the duration: • Deals {ExplosionDamage}()Damage to nearby Enemies. • Slows them by {Slow}% for {SlowDuration}s.
abilities.menuDescription: Launch a bouncing nano bubble that attaches to the first target hit for 0.75s and deals 20/35/50/65/80 (+20% ) physical damage. After the duration, the target and nearby enemies take 70/95/120/145/170 (+145%)(+65%) physical damage and are Slowed by 40/45/50/55/60% for 1s.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Launch a sticky grenade that detonates, slowing and damaging enemies.

abilities.name: Thrust
abilities.gameDescription: Thrust upwards after a short delay. • Hover for {HoverDuration}s. Whilst Hovering, dealing damage will fire a missile: • Deals {Damage}()Damage to the same Target. • Can only occur intermittently with Hypercharge.
abilities.menuDescription: After a short delay, thrust upwards in your current movement direction and hover for 3.75s. During this time, dealing damage will fire a missile that deals 15/20/25/30/35 (+20%)(+15%) physical damage to the same target. This can only occur intermittently with Hypercharge but the time decreases with bonus attack speed.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Launch yourself upwards to fly and launch missiles at targets you damage.

abilities.name: Orb
abilities.gameDescription: Unleash the Atomiser. • Travels until colliding with Terrain or an Enemy Hero. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Deals an extra {MissingHealthDamage}% Missing Health Damage.
abilities.menuDescription: Channel for a short period of time before firing a large orb of unstable energy. The orb stops on the first hero hit, exploding, dealing 200/330/460 (+150%)(+90%)(+15/20/25% of target’s missing health) physical damage.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Charge and unleash a nuclear projectile that deals massive damage at long range.

abilities.name: Passive
abilities.gameDescription: Upon killing an Enemy Unit: • Form an orb that explodes after 0.75s. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Orbs from Heroes have triple Damage and Radius. • Gain additional Jump Height.
abilities.menuDescription:
Skylar gains additional Jump Height.

Killing an Enemy Unit makes it explode after 0.75s, dealing 30 (+5 per level) physical damage to nearby targets.

Explosions from Enemy Heroes are 3x larger and deal 3x more damage.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Jump higher and cause explosions on killing enemies.

perks.name: Perk_Boost_AtomiserChannel
perks.description: Atomiser fires 3 blasts in succession, each dealing 60% of the original damage.

perks.name: Perk_Boost_PlasmaBarrage
perks.description: Plasma Grenade reduces its own Cooldown by 3.5s when attaching to an Enemy Hero.

perks.name: Perk_Boost_SuppressiveFire
perks.description: While Air Assault is active, Basic Attack range is increased by 12%.

data.description: Drum up support with Narbash, a tanky support whose rhythmic drums invigorate allies, disrupt foes, and turn the tide with the beat of war.

abilities.name: Wallop
abilities.gameDescription: Melee Basic Attack. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Attacks per second: {AttackSpeed}.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Beat your opponents like a drum with your Drumclubs.

abilities.name: Thunk
abilities.gameDescription: Throw a drumstick. • Deals {Damage}()Damage. • Stuns for {Duration}s. • Increase the Damage dealt by {RhythmDamage}% per Rhythm stack. • Generates 2 Rhythm stacks On-Hit.
abilities.menuDescription: Toss a drumstick that deals 95/140/185/230/275 (+75%)(+90%) magical damage and Stuns for 1/1.05/1.1/1.15/1.2s. Thunk's damage is increased by 1.5% per Rhythm stack. Grants 2 Rhythm stacks on hit.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Toss a Drumclub that deals damage and stuns. The damage is increased per Rhythm stack.

abilities.name: March
abilities.gameDescription: Bellow out a rallying war cry. • Grants {Percent}%() Decaying Movement Speed for {Duration}s. • Increase the duration by {RhythmDuration}s per Rhythm stack. • Generates {RhythmStacks} Rhythm stacks on use.
abilities.menuDescription:
Bellow out a rallying war cry, granting Narbash and his nearby Allies 25% decaying movement speed for 2s (+0.2s per Rhythm stack).

Grants 8 Rhythm stacks on use.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Bellow out a rallying war cry, granting yourself and nearby allies movement speed for a duration. The duration increases with Rhythm stacks.

abilities.name: SongOfMyPeople
abilities.gameDescription: Toggle: Play a soothing beat. • Heals by {Heal}() per second. • Increase the Heal by {RhythmAmount} per Rhythm stack. • Consume {ManaCost} Mana per tick to generate 2 Rhythm stacks. • Ticks 1% faster per 1 Ability Haste. • Healing is doubled for Allies.
abilities.menuDescription: Toggle: Play a soothing beat, healing Narbash and his nearby Allies by 10/11/12/13/14 (+6%)(+0.15/0.2/0.25/0.3/0.35 per Rhythm stack) each second. Each second the beat is active, it costs 20 mana and grants 1 Rhythm stack. All healing is twice as effective at healing Allies.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Toggle: Play a soothing beat to heal yourself and nearby allies. Healing is increased with Rhythm stacks.

abilities.name: CrashBangBoom
abilities.gameDescription: Channel a drum solo for 3s. • Gain {ReducedDamagePercent}% Damage Reduction. • Enemies are Slowed by {Percent}%. • Deals {Damage}()Damage over 10 hits. • The final hit Knocks Up and Stuns for {StunDuration}s. • Generates 2 Rhythm stacks per hit.
abilities.menuDescription: Channel a drum solo for 3s, granting Narbash 40% damage reduction. Nearby Enemies are Slowed by 40% and take 230/370/510 (+80%) magical damage over 10 hits, with the final hit Knocking Up all Enemies and Stunning them for 1.5s. Grants 2 Rhythm stacks each hit.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Channel a drum solo and gain damage reduction. Slow and damage enemies over time. When the effect ends, knock up all enemies.

abilities.name: Beatdrop
abilities.gameDescription:
<Header>On landing Basic Attacks or using Abilities:</>
• Generate stacks of <EffectText>Rhythm</>.
• Gain <AttackDamageText>{PhysicalPower}%</> increased <AttackDamageText>Physical Power</> per stack.
• <EffectText>Rhythm</> improves your Abilites.
• Stacks up to <EffectText>{MaxStacks}</> times. Stacks fall off slowly after <EffectText>{StackDuration}s</>.
• At maximum stacks, gain <ManaText>{MaxStackRegen} Mana Regeneration</> for <ManaText>{RegenDuration}s</>.
• Nearby Allies each increase the <ManaText>Mana Regen</> by <ManaText>{AlliedHeroRegen}</>.
abilities.menuDescription:
Narbash's basic attacks and abilities generate stacks of Rhythm that grant 1.5% increased physical power per stack and improve his abilities, stacking up to 24 times. Stacks fall off individually after 10s. 

At maximum stacks, gain 3 (+3 per nearby Allied Hero) mana regeneration for 5s.
abilities.simplifiedDescription: Your basic attacks and abilities generate stacks of Rhythm that grant physical power and improve your abilities.

perks.name: Perk_Narbash_BerserkersBeat
perks.description: March also grants Allies 15/20/25/30/35% Attack Speed.

perks.name: Perk_Narbash_PercussiveTear
perks.description: Each hit of Crash Bang Boom! Shreds 2.5% Armors for 3s.

perks.name: Perk_Narbash_RhythmicRecharge
perks.description: Narbash restores Mana equal to 12% of damage received.
